name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clean Manager - History and Cache cleaner

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy way to clear browser cache and history data. Simple way to clean history, downloads, cookie or set tasks for auto cleaning

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily clean your browser's cache, history, downloads, cookies, and more! You can automate browser cleaning by setting scheduled tasks that automatically delete your browsing data. Whether you want to clear specific site data or perform a full browser cleanup, you can customize your cleaning tasks and set them to run at regular intervals, keeping your browser fast and clutter-free .

Key Features:

- Task Scheduler: Set up tasks to automatically delete browsing data, cache, history, downloads, and cookies at predefined intervals.
- Comprehensive Cleanup: Remove unwanted data such as browsing history, cookies, cache, and more with just a click.
- Selective Data Cleaning: Choose what to clean â€“ from specific site data to full browser cleanup.
- Easy-to-Use Interface: Intuitive setup for creating and managing cleaning tasks
